sentences.english: The ability of clay minerals to catalyse decarboxylation has long been recognised.
sentences.chinese: 粘土矿物能催化脱羧基作用是早已认识到的问题。

sentences.english: Objective: To observe the effect of carboxyl-amino-polysaccharide on the gastric ulcer.
sentences.chinese: 目的观察羧基化氨基多糖药物抗胃溃疡的作用。

sentences.english: The proposals were given that new varieties of carboxylated chloroprene rubber should be developed.
sentences.chinese: 建议开发羧基化氯丁橡胶新品种。

sentences.english: The reasons for the carboxyl end group fluctuation of bottle grade PET base chips were analysed.
sentences.chinese: 对瓶用基片端羧基波动的原因进行了分析。

sentences.english: Carboxylic crosslinked polystyrene microsphere was prepared by F-C acylation reaction.
sentences.chinese: 通过傅克酰基化反应制备了羧基化交联聚苯乙烯微球。

sentences.english: The behavior of acrylic acid (AA) in emulsion copolymerization and characteristics of carboxylic latex were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了丙烯酸的乳液共聚合行为和羧基胶乳的特性。

sentences.english: A dicarboxyl capric amide surfactant and synthetic method thereof are provided.
sentences.chinese: 二羧基癸酸酰胺表面活性剂及其合成方法。

sentences.english: Determine carboxyl content with Fourier infrared spectrum instrument.
sentences.chinese: 用傅立叶红外光谱仪测定羧基含量。

sentences.english: A dicarboxyl oleic amide surfactant and synthetic method thereof are provided.
sentences.chinese: 二羧基油酸酰胺表面活性剂及其合成方法。

definition: peptide bond CO-NH/bond in protein between carboxyl radical and amino radical
